stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about the charges of the objects must be true?

features.html: Two small stationary objects with unknown nonzero charges are isolated from all other charges. The electric field strength is zero at the midpoint of the line joining the two objects.

choicesHtml: The charges are equal in magnitude but opposite in sign.
The charges are equal in magnitude and have the same sign.
The charges are not necessarily equal in magnitude but have opposite signs.
The charges are not necessarily equal in magnitude but have the same sign.
